original_text: You must not be like that. The most important person among you must become like the least important person. The person who is your leader must become like your servant.
korean_text: 너희는 그렇지 않을지니 너희 중에 큰 자는 젊은 자와 같고 다스리는 자는 섬기는 자와 같을지니라

sentences.original_text: You must not be like that
The most important person among you
must become like the least important person
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 작은 사람과 같이 되어야 한다

sentences.original_text: The person who is your leader
